mapper.select: SELECT p.cod_prod as cod_prod, p.cod_marca as cod_marca, m.descrip_marca as descrp_marca, p.cod_cat as cod_cat, c.nom_cat as nom_cat, c.descrip_cat as descrp_cat, p.descrip_prod as descrip_prod, detcate.sistema_operativo as det_sope, detcate.memoria_ram as mem_ram, p.precio_prod as precio, p.stk_prod as stock, p.stk_min_prod as stock_min from tb_producto p join tb_marca m on p.cod_marca=m.cod_marca join tb_categoria c on p.cod_cat=c.cod_cat join tb_caracteristica cate on p.cod_caract=cate.cod_caract join tb_det_caracteristica detcate on cate.cod_det_caract=detcate.cod_det_caract order by p.cod_prod asc
select cod_marca as idmarca, descrip_marca as nom_marca from tb_marca
select cod_cat as idcate, nom_cat as nom_cat, descrip_cat as descripCat from tb_categoria

select cod_det_caract as codDetCate, procesador as procesador, sistema_operativo as sist_opera, memoria_ram as memoria_ram, almacenamiento as almacenamiento, color as color, peso as peso, puerto_usb as puerto_usb, resolucion_pantalla as resolucion from tb_det_caracteristica
